name: Basic Mobile API
description: Handles basic functionality related to 3rd party (mobile apps) API calls.

mobileapi_index_bg_check_api_sessions_ag.title: Check mobile 3rd party sessions
mobileapi_index_bg_check_api_sessions_ag.timed_seconds_comment: Usually agent runs each hour, but if this interval will be lower run this job each 30 mins
mobileapi_index_bg_check_api_sessions_ag.stalling_minutes_comment: MINUTES!!! In some cases, if there are lots of sessions to clear, this might take some while...
